name: Grist
natural_language_description: 这是 Grist 节点。主要用于: Consume the Grist API

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Create Row (值: create) - Create rows in a table
Delete Row (值: delete) - Delete rows from a table
Get Many Rows (值: getAll) - Read rows from a table
Update Row (值: update) - Update rows in a table

docId.name: docId
docId.description: In your document, click your profile icon, then Document Settings, then copy the value under "This document's ID"
docId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document ID | 作用: In your document, click your profile icon, then Document Settings, then copy the value under "This document's ID" | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: ID of table to operate on. If unsure, look at the Code View.
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table ID | 作用: ID of table to operate on. If unsure, look at the Code View. | (必填项)

rowId.name: rowId
rowId.description: ID of the row to update
rowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Row ID | 作用: ID of the row to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions
additionalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: filter (值: None) - Only return rows matching all of the given filters. For complex filters, create a formula column and filter for the value "true".

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineInNode
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputs) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineInNode) - Set the value for each destination column

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsToSend.name: fieldsToSend
fieldsToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}
